document.full_text: bassem youssef, a 37-year-old cardiothoracic surgeon in cairo, has followed jon stewart's news parody model in establishing himself as a star on youtube, and soon, on television.
document.title: i.h.t. special section: middle east: surgeon using parody to dissect the news in egypt
lines_and_colors: bassem youssef, a 37-year-old cardiothoracic surgeon in cairo, has followed jon stewart's news parody model in establishing himself as a star on youtube, and soon, on television.
